Pre-Game Insights: India is eyeing a first major ICC tournament win in 12 years
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the iconic Wankhede stadium in Mumbai
The Indian team has played in seven World Cup semi-finals so far and won three of them
Tournament hosts India are eyeing a first major ICC tournament win in 12 years
Others: The match will be livestreamed on Disney+Hotstar app and website
The toss will take place at 1:30 pm and the match will begin at 2 pm
Cricket enthusiasts and Team India fans can watch the match on all Star Sports Network channels
